attributes.action: Increase the Nurse student bursery to £10,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, student nurses are paid £6,000  per annum as a means tested bursery.  This is not adequate to live on for people who will, one day, be at the frontline of Healthcare.  Nurses are highly skilled, highly important and vastly under-paid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
